analysis: Stops at 0.02% ($1) are tighter than the bid-ask spread â€” every trade is guaranteed to hit stop before target. Widening stops to 0.30% floor, targets to 0.50%, and cutting trade frequency. Gold ATR is 0.03-0.04% per minute; need stops at least 5-8x that to survive normal noise.
paramReason: Widen stops from 0.02% to 0.30% floor so ATR calc can't produce sub-spread stops; slow down entries to avoid overtrading
